txt.en: Of the magicks that can be wielded by Man or Elf, the hearts of beasts are among the most closely tied to the visible world, and so there are many who strive to master them.
Use Sign of the Wild: Protection

There are signs and sigils that can be used by the Wise to speak to the heart of a wild creature without words, but those who truly understand this art know that it is not the sign that speaks most loudly to the beast, but your own heart.
